Title: Relates to creating a system for permitting access to state lands for the purpose of collecting sap from maple trees and a tax credit for the purchase of qualified equipment used for the production of maple syrup
Summary: Relates to creating a system for permitting access to state lands for the purpose of collecting sap from maple trees and creating a tax credit for the purchase of qualified equipment used for the collection of maple sap and the production of maple syrup.
LawCode: Add §9-0309, amd §9-0303, En Con L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to directing the department of environmental conservation to create a system for permitting access to state lands for the purpose of collecting sap from maple trees; and to amend the tax law, in relation to creating a tax credit for the purchase of qualified equipment used for the collection of maple sap and the production of maple syrup
